effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user strikes the foe with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.
flavor_text.platinum: The user strikes the foe with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.
